==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Electro Slime Throw
|desc_1 = Digs an [[Electro Slime]] out of the ground and throws it at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. Staggering the Grenadier during this attack will knock the Electro Slime out of its hands. An Electro Slime knocked out of the Grenadier's hands will stay on the ground for a period of time before exploding and dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
*Although the Electro Slime is highlighted as an {{Electro}} entity under [[Elemental Sight]], it will not react with another element, neither will it cause an {{Electro}} [[Elemental Absorption]] to occur.
|file_1_2 = Electro Hilichurl Grenadier Electro Slime Throw Staggered

==Descriptions==
{{Description|The primitive wandering inhabitants of [[Teyvat]]'s wildernesses.<br>[[Electro Slime]]s don't seem to have as many applications as [[Pyro Slime]]s or [[Anemo Slime]]s in the benighted lives of the [[Hilichurls]].<br>Perhaps one day they may discover the flow of Elements between [[Electro Slime]] and [[Mutant Electro Slime]] and make some great progress...?|[[Archive]]}}
